mapper.sql: task_definition_key, customer_id, order_id, url, status, gmt_create
mapper.insert:
insert into material_down_his
task_definition_key,
customer_id,
order_id,
url,
status,
gmt_create,
#{taskDefinitionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: SELECT task_definition_key AS taskDefinitionKey, customer_id AS customerId, order_id AS orderId, url AS url, `STATUS` AS status, gmt_create AS gmtCreate FROM material_down_his where status ='1'
